channel.title: Crystal Reports on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Crystal Reports on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: Crystal Reports Redux
item.description: I didn’t think I’d be saying this many years down the road, but here goes anyway. Crystal Reports is my friend. Yep. Apparently, I’ve forgotten my disdain for this piece of software. It’s amusing (well, for me) that the last version of Crystal Reports that I used for the systems I developed back in the late 90s, is the same version I was forced to use last week, in modifying an old report template.
